TopicTitle: game crashes with no crash report

Articles.Content:
If it's crashing, you should be able to find the output log at KSP_x64_Data\output_log.txt -- if you've run KSP since the last crash, it will have been overwritten, so it will only be of use if you can copy it right after KSP crashes. If you can get that file and upload it, we'll be able to start looking around.

64-bit is however unstable -- you may find KSP to be more stable if you run the 32-bit version instead.
